Method Detail

createCopy

public static <T> T createCopy(T original,
                               org.eclipse.persistence.sessions.CopyGroup cg,
                               javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
Create copy of the original with only those attributes identified in the CopyGroup copied. Also clear the FetchGroup so that the copy can be serialized by JAXB (which will attempt to retrieve all attributes).

Parameters:
T -
original -
cg -
em -
Returns:

createCopies

public static <T> java.util.List<T> createCopies(java.util.List<T> originals,
                                                 org.eclipse.persistence.sessions.CopyGroup cg,
                                                 javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
Create copies of the originals with only those attributes identified in the CopyGroup copied. Also clear the FetchGroup so that instances can be serialized by JAXB (which will attempt to retrieve all attributes).

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
originals -
cg -
em -
Returns:

clearCopyGroup

public static void clearCopyGroup(org.eclipse.persistence.sessions.CopyGroup cg)
Remove the CopyGroup reference from each of the copies created by the CopyGroup. Uncopied fields will then be null rather than uninstantiated--and accessing them throw an exception because the copies are detached.

Parameters:
cg -
